Text: The picture quality is great. I have a WD TV Live media player hooked up to my hard drive and I am not getting any sound though. It's showing DTS sound in the info on the media player but nothing.
same problem in windows xp divx player, cyberlink and windows media NO SOUND!!

@biglittle1

In order to hear DTS/DTS-HD/DTS-HDMA audio tracks you need to connect your WD TV Live media player to a DTS-capable amplifier or receiver with an optical digital (Toslink) cable. Then DTS sound comes out loud and clear through your 5/6/7.1 speaker system.
No sound on LG BD390. Tried sound both through HDMI and Coax.
can this video be converted to any other formats?? or is it executable on VLC either??
Just get VLC and hook a HDMI cable to Tv and voila
